name: TI_2_1_3_7_Batch_Job_Started_System_Audit_Trigger
title: TI.2.1.3.7 Batch Job Started System Audit Trigger (Function)
description: Manage Audit Trigger initiated to track batch job started event.
purpose: Capture system batch job started event, both routine and exceptional, including key metadata (who, what, when, where, why).

statement.label: TI.2.1.3.7#01
statement.requirement: The system SHALL audit each occurrence when a batch job is initiated.

statement.label: TI.2.1.3.7#02
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the organization.

statement.label: TI.2.1.3.7#03
statement.requirement: IF known, THEN the system SHALL capture identity of the user.

statement.label: TI.2.1.3.7#04
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the system.

statement.label: TI.2.1.3.7#05
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the event initiating audit trigger.

statement.label: TI.2.1.3.7#06
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the date and time of the event initiating audit trigger.

statement.label: TI.2.1.3.7#07
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the location (i.e., network address).
